akn:section.akn:heading: Use of the Emancipation Hall of the Capitol Visitor Center

akn:content.akn:p: § 2203. Use of the Emancipation Hall of the Capitol Visitor Center The Emancipation Hall of the Capitol Visitor Center may not be used for any event, except upon the passage of a resolution agreed to by both houses of Congress authorizing the use of the Emancipation Hall for that event. (Pub. L. 110–437, title I, § 103, Oct. 20, 2008, 122 Stat. 4986.)
